full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## EP922-231466 ECCC Furniture Package 1A Panels

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3835455699
* **Amendment Number**: 7
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3835455699
* **Publication Date**: March 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 8, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Date**: May 31, 2023

### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of the Environment (ECCC) is issuing this Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for Furniture Package 1A Panels. This requirement falls under Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and includes the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to Calgary, Alberta by September 25, 2023. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT on June 8, 2023, will be declared non-responsive.

This tender is subject to various free trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Abou Ahmad, Kassan (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: kassan.abouahmad@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (
